DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted to assess the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and dose-limiting toxicity (DLT), to evaluate the pharmacokinetics, safety and preliminary anti-tumor activity of Sinotecean.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Sinotecean on Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics
